thread.section_title: Science News and Analysis - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: JPMorgan Applies to Launch Joint-Venture Brokerage in China

author: Allison Prang
title: JPMorgan Applies to Launch Joint-Venture Brokerage in China

organizations.name: launch joint-venture brokerage in china jpmorgan chase & co.

text:
JPMorgan Chase & Co. is seeking approval from a Chinese regulator to launch a joint-venture brokerage in the country, becoming the latest bank to explore the opportunity after Chinese authorities loosened rules on foreign firms controlling such ventures.
J.P. Morgan Broking (Hong Kong) Ltd., a unit of the company, has applied to seek a 51% stake in a joint-venture brokerage in China, said Gao Li, a spokeswoman for the China Securities Regulatory Commission, on Thursday. The CSRC will review the application, the spokeswoman... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
